/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with power lines and trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun casting a bright light that illuminates the scene.
